author: Rebecca Klar
title: South Carolina closes nonessential businesses
description: South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster (R) on Tuesday ordered all nonessential businesses to close in response to the coronavirus pandemic. The closures, including theaters, salons and concert venues...
content:
South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster (R) on Tuesday ordered all nonessential businesses to close in response to the coronavirus pandemic. 
The closures, including theaters, salons and concert venues, will go into effect starting Wednesday, McMaster announced a… [+771 chars]
